import React from "react"; function addCheckboxFunctionality() { const checkbox = document.querySelector('.form-check-input'); const textInput = document.querySelector('.form-control-place'); const status = document.getElementById('badge') checkbox.addEventListener('change', () => { if (checkbox.checked) { textInput.style.textDecoration = 'line-through'; } else { textInput.style.textDecoration = 'none'; } }); } export default function Card() { return ( <>
